ko-Preterit.text: gǧugrina u=tanuro hul d-ḥowər, əmmina u=tanuro ko-ḥawər, basle u=tanuro, haw ko-lozam-le ǧġoro ‘We would stoke the stove, until it turned white. Then we said: “It has become white, that is enough for the stove, it does not need more stoking’ JL 9.10.7;
